mapper.select: SELECT bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt FROM tbl_board ORDER BY bno desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_board ( bno, title, content, writer, regdate, viewcnt ) VALUES ( 3, #{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, sysdate(), 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_board SET viewcnt = viewcnt+1 WHERE bno = #{bno}
